name: Gaudí And Modernism
description:
Who was Antonio Gaudí? Why today he is admired around the world?
On this tour we will respond to these questions
In this itinerary we will see three masterpieces of Gaudi such as: La Sagrada Familia, La Casa Batlló and The Park Güell.
These three monuments are classified as Heritage Site by UNESCO.
Let yourself be accompanied by our local guides, they will lead you towards all these gems!
